text: Asal baat yeh hai ke in logon ko aur inke aabaa o ajdaad (fore-fathers) ko hum zindagi ka sar o saamaan diye chale gaye yahan tak ke inko din lag gaye (until the period grew too long for them). Magar kya inhein nazar nahin aata ke hum zameen ko mukhtalif simton se ghataye chale aa rahey hain (shrinking its boundaries)? Phir kya yeh gaalib aa jayenge
